channel.title: Condoms During Oral Sex
channel.description:
Well wearing protection for oral sex comes down to personal preference. What most people don't know is that 1-8 percent (odd ranges i know lol) of HIV cases are caused by oral. Also, less than 20 percent of people use protection for such activity's.
I'm wondering how many people use protection for oral sex here, why and was it your choice? This thread comes after a debate with someone on IRC. I also half did it for the lulz.
